reviewText:
This DVD is worth it's $$'s for the Bugmeister pattern.  I was introduced to this fly by John Perry himself when I had used his guiding service in Montana in the late 90's.  Since that time I have used the Bugmeister pattern in streams in Colorado, Montana, Alaska, Wyoming, Idaho, Washington and in Canada with unbelievable success.
John is a colorful and dynamic person who gives you some of the secrets to tying some of the best fly patterns that you can use in many different streams and conditions.
